content: This is kind of a minor point in the grand scheme of things, but chalk is currently nightly-only, while rust-analyzer builds on stable. Some of that is probably easy to fix and I'd be happy to do it (it would be an opportunity to get a bit more familiar with the chalk codebase), but chalk also seems to use specialization, which I assume won't be so easy to get around? @nikomatsakis
